rooms.description: Grand foyer with a Vastu compliant north-eastern entrance. Features natural lighting and subtle decor reflecting Chettinad style.
Spacious room adjoining the entrance hall with open space design, integrated seating areas, built-in shelves with traditional motifs. Large windows ensure ample natural light.
Modern kitchen designed in Chettinad style using local materials and finishes, with adjacent dining area for formal meals. Includes provisions for natural ventilation.
Luxurious bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom. Positioned in the east to promote positive energy according to Vastu principles.
A compact living and sleeping area for the household staff with basic amenities and a small kitchenette, located towards the north-west corner.

openings.description: Large entrance door with traditional design elements, ensuring compliance with local norms.
Provides access to an external balcony that overlooks the swimming pool area.

rooms.description: Dedicated entertainment space featuring state-of-the-art audiovisual systems, comfortable seating, and subtle ambient lighting.
Additional bedroom for guests or occasional use, designed with privacy and comfort in mind.
A quiet area ideal for work or study, positioned to minimize distractions. Incorporates natural light.
